title.rendered: STEDI LED FOG & DRL UPGRADE KIT TO SUIT ARB SUMMIT BULL BAR

content.rendered:
COMPATIBILITY

  • Fits the entire range of ARB’s Summit Bull Bars
  • Fits Toyota Hilux (N70) 2005 to 2012 (Pre-Facelift) with standard bumper as well as Hilux with older ARB Deluxe Bull bar.
  • Fits Toyota Landcruiser 70 series with the larger fog lights and with older ARB Bull bar, and standard front bumper.

SAFETY MEETS STYLE

Featuring integrated Day-time-Running-Lights (DRL) – Increases visibility of your  car so that other drivers see you on the road.

PLUG & PLAY INSTALLATION

Specifically designed LED Fog & DRL to bolt directly in to ARB Summit Bull bar housing without modification. The matching HB4 connectors means the LED fog light function can be up and running without any soldering or grafting.

BEAUTIFULLY DESIGNED & ENGINEERED

Improving on Orignal Equipment the STEDI Summit LED fog light is all alloy casing improving thermal efficiency as well as increased durability.

DETAILS

KEY TECHNICAL DETAILS 

  • Built in LED Day-time Running Light (DRL)
  • Two High Performance Osram Emitters
  • UV Stable Automotive Grade PC Primary Lens
  • Environmentally sealed matching HB4 connector, for easy plug and play installation.
  • Pressure Equalisation Vent | Eliminates condensation
  • IP67 Ingress Protection | Protected from immersion between 15 centimetres and 1 meter in depth for 10min at a time.
  • 50,000 hours Lifespan
  • 24 month Warranty
  • 6000K CCT
  • Includes all required tilt adjust spring and screw
  • All Alloy outer casing | The original is plastic.
  • RFI & EMI Suppression Circuitry

Price quoted is for a pair (ARB Fog Light Shroud shown is not included)

If you’re unsure whether your ARB bull bar is eligible feel free to get in touch with us for advice.

STEDI Designed & Manufacturered. 

This product is not endorsed by, directly affiliated with ARB. All product and company names are the registered trademarks of their original owners. The use of any trade name or trademark is for compatibility and reference purposes only and does not imply any association with the trademark holder of their product brand.

SPECIFICATIONS

FOG LED / DRL LED 12W FOG & 1.2W DRL
INPUT VOLTAGE 12v to 24v DC
FOG ACTUAL LUMENS 728 Lm each
DRL ACTUAL LUMENS 38 Lm each
LIFESPAN 50,000hours
CONNECTOR TYPE Sealed HB4
CERTIFICATION IP67
DRL DRAW 0.2A @ 13.6v
FOG LIGHT DRAW 0.9A @ 13.6v
FITS ARB Summit Bull Bars, Toyota 70 Series Landcruiser
OPERATING TEMP – 40°C to + 60°C
WEIGHT 0.60kg
CCT 6000K
HOUSIGN MATERIAL Die-Cast Alloy

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x STEDI ARB Summit Replacement LED Fog Lights
  • 2 x Tilt Adjustments Screws

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
